channel.title: Comments on: Summer Layer Cake – based on Iced Vovo biscuit

item.title: By: Traci Tritsaris
item.dc:creator: Traci Tritsaris
item.description: My mouth is simply watering when checkign out this cake. I am going to HAVE to bake it ASAP! Joining your blog after finding you through googling steamed pudding recipes. Love your work!
item.content:encoded: My mouth is simply watering when checkign out this cake. I am going to HAVE to bake it ASAP! Joining your blog after finding you through googling steamed pudding recipes. Love your work!

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud

item.description: Gorgeous layers :D What a lucky sister you have haha
